subject: Soccer
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Carlo Ancelotti was fired as Chelsea manager after a 1-0 loss at Everton, capping a season without a trophy a year after he led the club to the Premier League and F.A. Cup titles.
snippet: Carlo Ancelotti was fired as Chelsea manager after a 1-0 loss at Everton, capping a season without a trophy a year after he led the club to the Premier League and F.A. Cup titles.
